overview: Join the dance-fitness revolution that changed the way we “workout” forever. It’s fun, effective and best of all? Made for everyone!  People from all around the world have joined the calorie-burning dance fitness party and achieved amazing results - and now it’s your turn! Learn from the creator of the Zumba® himself, Beto Perez, as he takes you through the essential moves to get you dancing yourself into shape! THREE EASY-TO-FOLLOW DANCE FITNESS WORKOUTS
title: Zumba
